title: Киборг
overview: Evgeniy dreams of getting on a scooter, and Anna wants to stop being afraid and jump with a parachute. Maksim is a mentor and believes that his mentee will one day perform on the big stage. Each of them literally lost a part of themselves. They have lost an arm or a leg and do not yet know how to build their lives further. But each of them meets their guide, who will help them realize their dream and take a step into the future of cyborgs.
